description: A professional cleaning to remove plaque and tartar, leaving your teeth spotless.
Restoration of a tooth damaged by decay using composite or amalgam materials.
Removal of a damaged or decayed tooth to improve oral health.
A permanent solution for missing teeth, consisting of a titanium post and crown.
Treatment to save a severely infected or damaged tooth by removing the pulp.
A cosmetic procedure to brighten your teeth and enhance your smile.
Initial consultation to assess the need for orthodontic treatment.
Diagnostic imaging to identify issues not visible during a regular exam.
